name: Meridian Asset Management
overview: On the Northwestern slopes of Mount Olympus overlooking the Salt Lake Valley, Meridian enjoys an office location just east of I-215 at the 4500 South exit. Clients can access our office by visiting us at 4525 South Wasatch Boulevard. First started in 1998 to provide investment advice to a few clients in Utah, Meridian grew with the tech bubble. As conditions changed in early 2000, Meridian adapted and reached out to clients looking for a risk-managed approach. We continue providing personalized account management. We seek to offer each client the proper investments to meet their objectives while considering risk tolerance.
